Package comp3111.webscraper

Class WebScraper

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp3111.webscraper.WebScraper
  • public class WebScraper
extends java.lang.Object
    This webScraper class handles scraping from both etsy and craigslist. It will only look at the first page of each website.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      WebScraper()
      Default Constructor

    • Method Detail

      • setItem

        public Item setItem​(java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String url,
                    java.lang.String portal,
                    double price,
                    java.util.Date date)
        Helper function for scraping both etsy and craigslist
        Parameters:
        name - - Name of the item
        url - - Link to the product page
        portal - - There can only be two options: craigslist or etsy
        price - - The price of the item
        date - - Optional. In this implementation, it is only when scraping craigslist
        Returns:
        - instance of the Item class

      • craigslistScrape

        public java.util.List<Item> craigslistScrape​(java.lang.String searchUrl,
                                             java.lang.String startingURL)
                                      throws com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.FailingHttpStatusCodeException,
                                             java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                             java.io.IOException,
                                             java.text.ParseException
        Scrapes the first page of craigslist
        Parameters:
        searchUrl - - The url link to scrape
        startingURL - - The website link, e.g. "https://newyork.craigslist.org/"
        Returns:
        - returns a list of items scraped from craigslist
        Throws:
        com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.FailingHttpStatusCodeException
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        java.io.IOException
        java.text.ParseException

      • etsyScrape

        public java.util.List<Item> etsyScrape​(java.lang.String searchUrl,
                                       java.lang.String startingURL)
                                throws com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.FailingHttpStatusCodeException,
                                       java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                       java.io.IOException,
                                       java.text.ParseException
        Scrapes the first page of etsy
        Parameters:
        searchUrl - - The url link to scrape
        startingURL - - The website link, e.g. "https://www.etsy.com/hk-en/"
        Returns:
        - returns a list of scraped items from etsy
        Throws:
        com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.FailingHttpStatusCodeException
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        java.io.IOException
        java.text.ParseException

      • sort

        public java.util.List<Item> sort​(java.util.List<Item> result)
        Helper function to sort out the result (List of items). The result is sorted according to price (from cheapest to most expensive) and if the amount is equal, craigslist will go first.
        Parameters:
        result - - the list of items you want to sort
        Returns:
        - returns the sorted list

      • scrape

        public java.util.List<Item> scrape​(java.lang.String keyword)
        The main method implemented in the class. It will call the other two scrape functions
        Parameters:
        keyword - - the keyword you want to search
        Returns:
        A list of Item that has found. A zero size list is return if nothing is found. Null if any exception (e.g. no connectivity)

        public void closeConnection()
